login_subtitle: Login to continue your comfortable journey with Iteka Ride.
signup_subtitle: Sign up to get started finding your perfect ride.
finding_driver_subtitle: We're connecting you with the nearest captain for a swift pickup.
captain_on_way: Your captain is on the way. You'll be notified when they arrive.
alert_location_msg: To find you the best rides and show your location on the map, we need your permission to access your location.
alert_delete_place_msg: This will remove the place from your quick access list. You can always add it back later.
alert_schedule_success_msg: Your ride has been scheduled successfully. We'll notify you when your captain is assigned near your departure time.
alert_support_msg: Our support team is working hard to get this ready. For now, please visit our website for any urgent help.
alert_login_failed_msg: The phone number or PIN you entered is incorrect. Please double-check and try again.
alert_signup_error_msg: Please make sure your name, phone, and PIN are filled in correctly so we can create your account.
alert_signup_pin_error: For your security, please use a 4-digit PIN.
alert_cancel_ride_msg: If you cancel now, it might take a moment to find another ride later. Are you sure you'd like to cancel?
alert_cancel_trip_msg: We're almost there! Are you sure you want to end your journey now? Standard trip charges will still apply.
alert_cancel_search_msg: Are you sure you want to stop looking for a ride?
alert_place_saved_msg: has been added to your saved places.
help_today: How can we help you today?
onboarding_slide1_desc: Request a ride and get picked up by a nearby community driver
onboarding_slide2_desc: Tell us where you want to go and choose a route that suits you
onboarding_slide3_desc: Get to your destination safely and comfortably with our top drivers
